name: safety-outlier-explorer
description: Chart showing participant trajectories of lab measures, vital signs and other related measures in clinical trials.
author: Rho, Inc.

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run format && npm run build-md
scripts.build-test: npm run bundle && npm run format && npm run build-md && npm run test-page
scripts.format: npm run format-src && npm run format-bundle
scripts.test-page: start chrome ./test-page/index.html && start firefox ./test-page/index.html && start iexplore file://%CD%/test-page/index.html
